body_html: @mkalininait I think the latter is a good compromise. Besides, two out of the three projects (Processing and Wikimedia) have offered their preferred ways of being contacted in the project overview anyway, so the only one that doesn't offer information on contacting the mentor is OpenDF. I will get in touch with them (OpenDF submitter and mentor) and ask which information we should provide in the project overview.
